description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: The world of carpet production is elevated to new heights with the exquisite craftsmanship of hand-tufted carpets. Renowned for their luxury, creativity, and artistic flair, these carpets stand as a testament to sophistication and elegance.
description.shortDescription: RIICH hand-tufted carpets, in particular, take this art form to unparalleled levels, providing a canvas for designers, architects, and discerning end-users to adorn their spaces with unparalleled beauty and brilliance.

idealSettings.Hotel Lobbies & Guest Suites: Elevate the ambiance of luxury hotels with opulent and unique carpet designs.
idealSettings.Condominium Public Spaces: Infuse character and charm into communal areas with hand-tufted masterpieces.
idealSettings.Corporate Office Lobbies: Make a lasting impression on clients and employees with carpets that exude elegance.
idealSettings.Country Clubs: Add a touch of sophistication to recreational spaces with bespoke hand-tufted carpets.
idealSettings.Yachts: Enhance the grandeur of yachts with carpets that reflect a commitment to luxury and style.
idealSettings.Theaters: Create a theatrical experience from the moment patrons enter with captivating carpet designs.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Our Oriental rug, also called a hand-knotted rug. This rug is created completely by hand on a vertical loom. The Knotting is a 2,000-year-old, highly specialized weaving technique that demands extraordinary dexterity, patience, and artistry thatâ€™s created with excellence at RIICH.

idealSettings.Art Galleries: A plush hand-knotted carpet that accentuates the design and refinement of the gallery area will elevate the atmosphere and showcase artwork.
idealSettings.Yachts & Luxury Boats: Elevate the interiors of yachts to a level of comfort and refinement to create a tranquil and fashionable journey.
idealSettings.High-end Spas: The luxurious texture and elaborate patterns of hand-knotted carpets provide a serene and sumptuous ambiance in spa relaxation rooms.
idealSettings.Private Libraries: Provide a warm and welcoming environment for reading and contemplation, enhancing the comfort and elegance of a private library.
idealSettings.Home Theaters: A hand-knotted carpet adds comfort and a touch of elegance to the movie-watching experience, transforming a home theater into an opulent hideaway.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Our handloom carpets are carefully crafted by skilled artisans using traditional weaving techniques, resulting in quality and beauty.
description.shortDescription: Riich Handloom Carpets are versatile and can be used in a variety of interior settings. Whether adorning the floors of a grand living room, adding warmth to a cozy bedroom, or enhancing the elegance of a formal dining area, our handloom carpets bring a touch of luxury and sophistication to any space. From contemporary chic to timeless traditional, our carpets complement a wide range of interior styles and aesthetics, making them a coveted addition to both residential and commercial spaces.

idealSettings.Luxurious Living: Elevate your living room with a RIICH Hand-loom Carpet, adding sophistication and warmth for entertaining or relaxation.
idealSettings.Cozy Retreat: Transform your bedroom into a cozy sanctuary with a soft and elegant RIICH Hand-loom Carpet, perfect for comfort and style.
idealSettings.Dining Opulence: Set the scene for memorable meals with a stunning RIICH Hand-loom Carpet, adding richness and elegance to formal dining areas.
idealSettings.Professional Presence: Make a statement of sophistication in executive offices with RIICH Hand-loom Carpets, exuding professionalism and luxury.
idealSettings.Hotel Luxury: Impress guests in boutique hotels and resorts with RIICH Hand-loom Carpets, elevating ambiance with exquisite craftsmanship.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: A woven carpet can be readily seamed across the ends as well as along the sides, whereas a handwoven carpet is simply stitched together along the side. This implies that woven carpet installation takes less carpet, is typically faster, requires less skill, and is less error-prone.

idealSettings.Bedrooms: A soft, opulent RIICH Hand-woven carpet will turn your bedroom into a warm haven that offers comfort and flair for your own private haven.
idealSettings.Formal Dining Areas: Richness and refinement are added to your formal dining room with a gorgeous RIICH Hand-woven carpet, which will elevate your dining experience.
idealSettings.Executive Offices: Add a touch of luxury to your business environment and make a statement of sophistication and professionalism in your executive offices with a RIICH Hand-woven Carpet.
idealSettings.Boutique Hotels & Resorts: Show off to your visitors the beautiful craftsmanship of RIICH Hand-woven Carpets, which are ideal for hallways, rooms, and other areas.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Vinyl flooring offers a versatile and affordable solution for both residential and commercial spaces. With its wide range of styles, including wood, stone, and tile designs, vinyl flooring can mimic the look of natural materials while providing enhanced durability and ease of maintenance. Resistant to water, scratches, and stains, vinyl flooring is an ideal choice for high-traffic areas such as kitchens, bathrooms, and entryways. Its simple installation process makes it a popular option for DIY enthusiasts and professional installers alike.

idealSettings.Kitchen: Resistant to spills and stains, perfect for withstanding the demands of cooking and meal prep.
idealSettings.Bathroom: Waterproof and easy to clean, providing a durable flooring option for moisture-prone areas.
idealSettings.Commercial Spaces: Offers durability and versatility for offices, retail stores, and hospitality venues, enduring heavy foot traffic with style.
idealSettings.Basements: Moisture-resistant and low-maintenance, ideal for creating functional living spaces below ground level.
idealSettings.Rental Properties: Easy to install and replace, providing landlords with a cost-effective and attractive flooring solution for rental units.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: SPC (Stone Plastic Composite) flooring combines the durability of stone with the versatility of plastic to create a robust and resilient flooring option. Its rigid core construction makes it highly resistant to impacts, scratches, and water, suitable for both residential and commercial use. With a wide range of styles and colors available, SPC flooring offers the authentic look of wood, tile, or stone without the maintenance requirements. Easy to install and maintain, SPC flooring provides a long-lasting and stylish solution for any interior space.

idealSettings.Residential Spaces: Provides durability and style for living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and bathrooms, withstanding daily wear and tear.
idealSettings.Commercial Areas: Perfect for offices, retail stores, restaurants, and cafes, offering a stylish and resilient flooring option for high-traffic environments.
idealSettings.Moisture-Prone Areas: Resistant to water damage, making it suitable for basements, laundry rooms, and entryways where spills are common.
idealSettings.Pet-Friendly Environments: Scratch-resistant and easy to clean, ideal for homes with pets, ensuring a durable and hygienic flooring solution.
idealSettings.Healthcare Facilities: Provides a hygienic and low-maintenance flooring option for hospitals, clinics, and assisted living facilities, meeting stringent hygiene standards while offering comfort underfoot.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Our Axminster carpets are well known for their rich designs and long lifespan. They are made using a special weaving technique that produces a wide range of colors and fine detail. These carpets combine luxury and functionality, making them ideal for both commercial and residential settings. They are especially great for high-traffic areas. Axminster carpets are a distinguished option for any room due to their superb craftsmanship and classic charm.

idealSettings.Luxury Hotels: Lobbies, bedrooms, passages, guest rooms etc.. can benefit greatly from the elegant and long-lasting addition of luxury hotels.
idealSettings.Conference centers: Sophisticated but robust, perfect for sizable meeting rooms and event venues.
idealSettings.High-end Restaurants: Robust quality and elaborate designs elevate the dining experience.
idealSettings.Historic Buildings: Sturdy Axminster carpets will handle the demands of current use while preserving the historic appeal.
idealSettings.Boutique retail stores: Use rich textures and intricate patterns to create a classy shopping atmosphere.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Carpet tiles offer versatility and convenience, allowing for customizable flooring solutions in various spaces. Their modular design makes installation and maintenance effortless, perfect for both commercial and residential applications. With a wide range of colors, patterns, and textures available, carpet tiles provide endless possibilities for creating unique and stylish interiors.

idealSettings.Office Spaces: Versatile and easy to install, providing a practical and stylish flooring solution for work environments.
idealSettings.Educational Facilities: Durable and customization, perfect for classrooms, libraries, and common areas in schools and universities.
idealSettings.Retail Stores: Offers a visually appealing and durable flooring option for enhancing the ambiance of shopping spaces while withstanding heavy foot traffic.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Gym flooring is designed to withstand the rigorous demands of athletic activities while providing safety, comfort, and durability. With options ranging from rubber tiles to interlocking mats, gym flooring offers impact absorption and slip resistance to reduce the risk of injury during workouts. Its resilient construction also minimizes noise and vibration, creating a conducive environment for fitness enthusiasts. Whether in commercial gyms, home workout spaces, or sports facilities, gym flooring ensures a supportive surface for all types of exercise routines.

idealSettings.Commercial Gyms: Provides a durable and shock-absorbent surface for weightlifting, cardio, and high-intensity workouts.
idealSettings.Home Gyms: Offers a comfortable and safe flooring option for personal fitness spaces, accommodating various exercise routines.
idealSettings.Fitness Studios: Creates a supportive and slip-resistant surface for group exercise classes, yoga sessions, and functional training.
idealSettings.Sports Facilities: Enhances performance and safety in indoor courts, training areas, and multipurpose sports complexes, catering to athletes of all levels.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Our Woven vinyl flooring combines the durability of vinyl with the look and feel of traditional woven textiles. Its resilient construction makes it ideal for high-traffic areas, while its modern designs add a touch of sophistication to any space. Easy to clean and maintain, woven vinyl flooring offers both style and practicality for residential and commercial settings.

idealSettings.Kitchen and Dining Areas: Resilient and easy to clean, perfect for withstanding spills and heavy foot traffic.
idealSettings.Commercial Spaces: Provides durability and style for offices, retail stores, and hospitality venues, enhancing the overall aesthetic.
idealSettings.Bathrooms and Laundry Rooms: Water-resistant and low-maintenance, offering a practical flooring solution for moisture-prone areas.
idealSettings.Outdoor Spaces: Weather-resistant and durable, ideal for patios, decks, and poolside areas, adding both style and functionality.
idealSettings.Children's Playrooms: Soft underfoot and easy to clean, creating a safe and comfortable environment for playtime activities.

Made with durable materials, these carpets are easy to maintain, ensuring a clean and inviting environment for prayer. Suitable for both home and community prayer spaces, they offer a blend of elegance and functionality

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: LVT (Luxury Vinyl Tile) flooring offers the perfect blend of style, durability, and affordability. With its realistic wood, stone, or tile designs, LVT flooring adds a touch of elegance to any space. Resistant to scratches, stains, and water, it provides a low-maintenance flooring solution for both residential and commercial settings. Easy to install and maintain, LVT flooring is an ideal choice for those seeking beauty and practicality in their floors.

idealSettings.Residential Interiors: Enhances the beauty of living rooms, kitchens, bathrooms, and bedrooms with its stylish and durable design.
idealSettings.Commercial Spaces: Perfect for offices, retail stores, restaurants, and hospitality venues, offering a sophisticated flooring option that can withstand heavy foot traffic.

description.title: Description
description.fullDescription: Kilim carpets are flat-woven rugs known for their vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and unique textures. Made from natural fibers like wool and cotton, they are lightweight, durable, and often feature geometric shapes and tribal motifs. Kilim carpets are characterized by their earthy palettes and the use of vegetable dyes.
description.shortDescription: Kilim carpets are not only functional but also artistic pieces that can elevate the aesthetic of any space. Their versatility and unique designs make them suitable for a wide range of settings, from modern homes to traditional spaces, allowing them to fit seamlessly into various decor styles.

idealSettings.Living Rooms: Bring warmth and character to living rooms, adding a cozy yet sophisticated touch with their vibrant colors and intricate patterns.
idealSettings.Bedrooms: In bedrooms, Kilim rugs provide a comfortable, soft surface underfoot while adding a splash of color and texture.
idealSettings.Dining Areas: A Kilim carpet in the dining area adds a touch of elegance and artistry. Its flat-weave design is durable and easy to clean, making it a practical yet beautiful choice for high-traffic areas.
idealSettings.Entryways and Hallways: ilim rugs are ideal for entryways and hallways, offering a durable yet stylish solution that can handle foot traffic while leaving a lasting impression with their vibrant designs and unique patterns.
idealSettings.Outdoor Spaces: Durable and weather-resistant, Kilim carpets are an excellent choice for outdoor spaces like patios or balconies.
